a.style: font-family:"Playfair Display", Georgia, "Times New Roman", serif

text.tspan: Natural gas consumption by region, 1965 to 2018
Annual natural gas consumption, measured in terawatt-hour (TWh) equivalents.
Source: BP Statistical Review of Global Energy (2019)
Note: CIS (Commonwealth of Independent States) is an organization of ten post-Soviet republics in Eurasia following break-up of the Soviet
